text_block_list.text: Twin Turbo say she want to go play. That's why I decide to visit amusement park on my day off.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ah～!! So many! Lots of attraction! Trainer, which one? Which one should we visit first?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Turbo want to do everything so, uh uh… Let's start from there!!
As training progressed, I had more things to think about. Maybe because of that, I haven't been able to sleep well lately.
I was thinking to at least take it easy on my day off, but when I look at Twin Turbo happy face I couldn't bring myself to say no.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Yeah!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Uwahaiiii!! Jet coaster is so fast! Nice fight with Turbo!! Uwaaaaaai!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Come out ghost!! Turbo is not scared at all! Turbo is the scary one! Ugaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ahahahaha!! The jet coaster is fast, and the ghost was surprised when they see Turbo!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: The Coffee cup was spinning around make me dizzy! Trainer almost jumped out of the cup was so funny!
choice_data_list: We already visit most of the attraction……

text_block_list.text: It's almost the time. If the road is crowded, we might barely pass the curfew.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ehhh!? No no! I want to play～! Want to play more～! Turbo is still full of energy!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Look Trainer! That way! There is boat over there, and there is game corner next to it!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Hey, let's go, let's go…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: But…… ah! Then that one! That one will be the last!!
When I look at the direction where Twin Turbo is pointing I can see the text "Giant Maze". It look like we are going to walk for a while……

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Turbo is a genius, so I can reach the goal quickly!! Trainer just have to follow after Turbo.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Yes!!
I couldn't resist the happy face of Twin Turbo. As a result, I ended up accompanying her through the giant maze with a sigh.
The sight of Twin Turbo that told me to follow her disappear instantly…
I walked leisurely toward the goal, I manage to reach the goal faster than I expected.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Another dead end!? Why!? Where am I!? Trainer! Where is Trainer!? Did I get lost!?
As I was waiting on the bench, I heard Twin Turbo's voice coming from inside the maze.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ehhhhh!?!?! Why why!? Turbo was supposed to be in the front!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: What!? Another dead end! Unununu! Turbo engine reverse gear～!
The distant sound of twin turbo voices and the rustling of the wind. For some reason feel very comfortable. I closed my eyes and―

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: I'm out!! As expected Turbo is genius!! Ehehehe! Trainer, Trainer! Look I reach the goal―

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Eh? Eh? Trainer? Hey, hey!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: ……Hah? Trainer, are you angry!? Is it because Turbo is late!?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Trai… ner? Ah you are sleeping! You scared me! Wake up! Turbo reach the goal! Trainer!
I fell asleep while waiting. I haven't slept this well in a long time.
I shake my sleepy head and then exhale deeply. My neck hurts a little from sleeping sitting up, but I feel good.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: I did!! I made it without using the "ruthless" technique!! I didn't give up because Turbo is amazing! That was fun!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: But, Trainer doesn't speak, I thought you are angry because it was already pitch black outside!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Eh?
While listening to Twin Turbo's frantic but joyful voice in the distance. The sound of the leaves and the breeze made for a very pleasant time.
And just like now. Listening to Twin Turbo who is happily talking about reaching the goal, It always brightens my mood.
Ignoring her reaction, I just say thank you at her directly. Twin Turbo make a confused face, that look on her face make me laugh again.
choice_data_list: Now for sure, let's go home

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Eeh? …Ah, yeah.
While stretching, we head toward the amusement park exit. I hope we can make it in time for curfew.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Even though I made you wait, you are smiling…… ……why??

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: You are always smiling… but, hmm? It's like… it's like… I don't know??
"thank you"

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: ……Ah, yes!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Trainer! Trainer! Turbo is having so much fun! It's like boom-boom!
Is she happy because she get to play, or is she happy as long as she is having fun.
Either way, I was able to see Twin Turbo's happy face, so it doesn't matter.
